short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get inline go/link detection and much more with this power extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Golinks are short intuitive links that are accessible anywhere. This extension enables users to convert any go/link that appears on a page and convert it into a clickable link saving seconds each time.
